_comment: Created by ianb on 14/10/2013 11:43:15 using v0.9
title: How have rates of inpatient VTE changed?
analysis_commentary: In acute setting, incidence of venous thromboembolism (VTE) decreased from 1.5% of sampled patients in April 2012 to 0.9% of patients in April 2013.
data_source: Health & Social Care Information Centre, NHS Safety Thermometer
